channel.title: Purbanchal Directory - Recently Added Listings - Hardware Shops

item.title: Mahabir Hardware Center
item.description: Mahabir Hardware Center is a complete hardware shop situated at Biratnagar, Morang, Nepal. We provide you items such as GI Pipes, Jasta pata, Kitchen accessories ( combot, brush, pipes, etc). Please feel free to call us at provide you with necessary items at a reasonable rate.
